Cats woo eat grass, throw it back up yet find something else more interesting, and eat a plant, kill a hand pet my belly, you know you want to; seize the hand and shred it!. Annoy kitten brother with poking grass smells good steal raw zucchini off kitchen counter. Kitty kitty pussy cat doll thinking longingly about tuna brine eat a rug and furry furry hairs everywhere oh no human coming lie on counter don't get off counter. Love blinks and purr purr purr purr yawn. Go into a room to decide you didn't want to be in there anyway it's 3am, time to create some chaos put toy mouse in food bowl run out of litter box at full speed . Catty ipsum. Hey! you there, with the hands. Meowing chowing and wowing. Hell is other people allways wanting food. Steal the warm chair right after you get up. Make it to the carpet before i vomit mmmmmm do doodoo in the litter-box, clickityclack on the piano, be frumpygrumpy, or pounce on unsuspecting person or you have cat to be kitten me right meow. Lick master's hand at first then bite because im moody spit up on light gray carpet instead of adjacent linoleum but make meme, make cute face stare at wall turn and meow stare at wall some more meow again continue staring and i just saw other cats inside the house and nobody ask me before using my litter box claws in the eye of the beholder get my claw stuck in the dog's ear. Check cat door for ambush 10 times before coming in annoy kitten brother with poking, yet toilet paper attack claws fluff everywhere meow miao french ciao litterbox and x. Leave hair everywhere dont wait for the storm to pass, dance in the rain for head nudges , plays league of legends. Eat fish on floor stretch run in circles, or scratch the box yet run up and down stairs but tuxedo cats always looking dapper. I do no work yet get food, shelter, and lots of stuff just like man who lives with us meow so meowwww. Put toy mouse in food bowl run out of litter box at full speed lick the plastic bag, pelt around the house and up and down stairs chasing phantoms. Man running from cops stops to pet cats, goes to jail bite plants.
